## Short-Term Goals
Gain expertise in data-driven IT management through certifications and projects.
Secure a full-time role in process optimization and IT management.
Enhance skills in AI, machine learning, and cloud computing.
## Long-Term Goals
Transition to a leadership role in IT or analytics within five years.
Establish a consultancy specializing in process optimization.
Pursue executive certifications or advanced degrees.
## Adaptability
Stay updated via professional networks, mentorship, and workshops.
Continuously upgrade technical skills through online certifications.
